entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 25.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Snow over southern sections. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Amount 5 cm over southern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 27.
